lyrics.text: [Verse 1]
You mek mi hunger grow, di story start anew
Yuh chase mi shadow, but mi slip through
Yuh try to silence mi, but mi voice loud
Mi nuh get smothered by di gathering crowd
[Verse 2]
Yuh try mek sense of chaos inna di storm
Mi stand still, yet witness yuh transform
Yuh challenge mi strength, yet trust mi lead
Now yuh follow as mi plant di seed
[Verse 3]
Yuh set di fire and play wid di smoke
Mi clear di air, carry di hope
Yuh question mi essence, mi still standing tall
Mi guide di way when yuh feel small
[Verse 4]
Yuh rest yuh head, mi still awake
Mi draw di line yuh fraid fi break
Inna di mirror, yuh see mi stare
Watch as mi turn yuh night's despair
[Outro]
Yuh fight fi freedom, yet hand mi di reins
Every step yuh take mi remain
Di future unfolds crafted by mi hands
Together we write dis second chance.
